article_title: Outgoing CEO Says Walgreen-Alliance Boots Deal Will Be 'Difficult' To Replicate

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Outgoing Walgreen Co. (WAG) chief executive officer Greg Wasson, who is retiring from the iconic pharmacy giant, said today the acquisition of European drugstore giant Alliance Boots will close Dec. 31 - earlier than expect - and “bring Walgreens to the world and Alliance Boots to America.” Wasson, 56, is stepping [...]
